jade.tools.ascml.model.runnable
Class AbstractRunnable

java.lang.Object
  jade.tools.ascml.model.runnable.AbstractRunnable
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAbstractRunnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RunnableAgentInstance, RunnableRemoteSocietyInstanceReference, RunnableSocietyInstance
public class AbstractRunnable
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAbstractRunnable

Model-object containing all required information about a running SocietyInstance.

setStatus

public void setStatus(Status newStatus)
Set the status of this instance. By setting the new status to NOT_RUNNING, the runnable instance is automatically removed from the parent's runnable-list.

Specified by:
setStatus in interface IAbstractRunnable
Parameters:
newStatus - The instance's new status.

informStatus

public void informStatus(java.lang.String runnableName,
                         Status newStatus,
                         Status oldStatus)
Runnables may inform their parent-Runnables (e.g. the RunnableSociety to which a RunnableSociety or -AgentInstance belongs) about a status-change of their own.

Specified by:
informStatus in interface IAbstractRunnable
Parameters:
runnableName - The name of the runnable-model, whose status changed (only used for debugging)
newStatus - New status of the agent
oldStatus - Old status of the agent
